body: I like this for one specific reason: page 22, where they make it clear the whole story is actually consensual roleplay. Reminds me of the post-scene interviews Kink.com used to put at the end of their BDSM shoots - just showing that the actresses are fine, nobody's been really hurt, everyone had fun, it was all SSC. It's a nice touch. Wish more artists did this.
jaraxxus the artist does that in every manga he makes
finally some unique art from the japanese
Wait wait, so the entire thing is just a play they're doing?
Short haired women like this one's are a 100/10
